page_name: 12V Transformer for Freedom Heated Towel Rails
description:
12 volt transformer suitable for Freedom Heated Towel Rails.

One transformer can be used for multiple rails. Appropriate Power Level can be calculated by adding the wattage of all rails together.

E.g. 4 x 'Largo W632 x D100, 23W' rails requires 4x23=96W – select Power Output of 35-105 Watts.

Note: Transformers should be installed with a maximum distance of two meters between the towel rail and the transformer.

|

    • Freedom HTR Installation Instructions.pdf

description:
The Arrowtown Laundry Package has been designed with storage and organisation in mind! With a wall cabinet, tall storage cabinet and floor cabinet this compact package offers the perfect solution for those smaller spaces without compromising on storage!

  • Sweet Maple cabinet finish with white interior
  • Designed to fit into a 1.8m space but can be customised to fit any space
  • Brushed Nickel Roma handles
  • 20mm Midnight Stone Quartz benchtop
  • Soft close hinges and full extension drawers supplied by Hettich
  • Sink Mixer sold separately
  • Select from seven cabinet finishes and two Quartz benchtop finishes

Check out our Laundry Brochure here

All laundry packages include assembled cabinetry, 20mm Quartz benchtop, handles, stainless steel sink and mixer

Laundries are available to order through our nationwide stockists

description:
Eliminate toilet odour at the source with the Crest Back-To-Wall Odourless Toilet. Featuring innovative ventilation technology that prevents odours from leaving the toilet bowl.

Note: RRP does not include the PIR Motion Sensor and needs to be ordered separately.

  • WELS 4-Star rating
  • Water inlet: Back left
  • Rimless flush technology
  • Thin soft close seat with quick release
  • Trap: Universal
  • Material: Vitreous China
  • Fixing: Toilet pan screwed & silicone to floor

Required: PIR Motion Sensor 12V - See [8060]

Note: The PIR Motion Sensor automatically activates the odour control system and has been specifically designed for the range of Milu Odourless Toilets.

Check out our Milu Odourless Toilet Brochure here

description:
The Milu PIR 12V Sensor automatically activates Milu’s odour control system so odours are eliminated no matter what.

  • Automatically activates Milu’s odour control system when motion is detected
  • Once motion is detected within range, the Odour Control System is activated and remains on while motion is present. When motion is no longer present the fan runs for 4 minutes before turning off
  • Sensor field of view has been designed to function within a small space to isolate the operating zone and minimise false triggers

Installation:

  • Designed for installation on the ceiling above the toilet (70mm circular ceiling cut-out)
  • 2mm DC plug and socket for easy connection

Check out our Milu Odourless Toilet Brochure here

The Vega Double Tier Vanity is designed and assembled in NZ and features contemporary negative detail cabinetry with soft close drawers and luxurious slab tops to elevate your bathroom.

description:
Upgrade your bathroom or ensuite with Vera Round Heated Towel Rails from our range of Freedom Heated Towel Rails.

  • Rounded edge, single bar
  • Durable Stainless Steel
  • IP45, 13W
  • Right hand concealed wiring
  • 5 Year Warranty

In wall pre-wiring and solid timber internal wall fixing is required prior to installation. Recommended for mounting on hard surfaces, such as tile walls. Be sure to let your builder know prior to installation of gib.

Installation should be performed by a registered electrician and requires a 12V transformer which is sold separately. *Price is per bar
